title: NGI Forum 2025 marks a strategic shift from Next Generation Internet toward the Open Internet Stack
content: The Next Generation Internet (NGI) Forum 2025, the flagship event of the European Commission’s NGI initiative, took place in Brussels on 19-20 June, with over 200 on-site participants and many more via web stream. The Forum focused on accelerating the shift from research and experimentation to the deployment of sovereign, open digital infrastructures. The post NGI Forum 2025 marks a strategic shift from Next Generation Internet toward the Open Internet Stack appeared first on Next Generation Int
creator: Mario Amè

title: From NGI to the Open Internet Stack: Charting the Next Chapter in Europe’s Digital Future
content: Since its launch in 2018, the Next Generation Internet (NGI) initiative has empowered over 1,400 open-source projects, laying the groundwork for a more open, inclusive, and human-centric internet in Europe. But as the digital landscape evolves, so must NGI. The post From NGI to the Open Internet Stack: Charting the Next Chapter in Europe’s Digital Future appeared first on Next Generation Internet .
creator: Mario Amè
